bug.author: 3vilGremlin
bug.description: Seeing the following error after upgrade to 1.1.0RC0 pwnagotchi-launcher[436]: [2019-10-27 11:38:12,184] [ERROR] on_webhook() missing 1 required positional argument: 'path' Have rebooted but issue persists. Running on RPi0 with WaveShare V2 screen and no other attachments Plugins installed are: auto-update memtemp bt-tether net-pos aircrackonly wpa-sec onlinehashcrack webgpsmap
